PerfectNetExp.abs: buoyant的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... aduncous 向内弯曲的... curtal 切短物... telson 尾节(昆虫), 毒刺(蝎类).
... The ship was docked at Liverpool. 船停靠在利物浦。 Curtal:an animal with a docked tail. 被截尾动物:尾巴被截短的动物.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (denoting a short-barrelled cannon): from French courtault, from court 'short' + the pejorative suffix -ault. In both English and French the noun denoted various items characterized by something short, especially an animal with a docked tail, which probably gave rise to the adjective sense
